name: BIPHASIC INSULIN LISPRO
cautions: Cautions see section 6.1.1.1 and Insulin Lispro; interactions: Appendix 1 (antidiabetics)
side-effects:
Side-effects see under Insulin (section 6.1.1.1);
protamine may cause allergic reactions
doses:
By subcutaneous injection, up to 15 minutes
before or soon after a meal, according to requirements
